item.title: 10 Reasons to build your data blog with blogdown
item.author: m.harper@outlook.com (Mikey Harper)
item.description: Blogdown Reasons To Consider 1. Easily (and cheaply) host your website Wordclouds Why Consider Features Interactive Charts Interactive Maps Flowcharts and Visualisations World Visualisations Embed Tables Wordclouds Features and Cross Referencing Easily Cite References Conclusion References I have been toying with the idea for a while about setting up a website through Hugo.
